item.title: Building a CTF Web Application: Lessons from Horsetooth Liquidators
item.author: george.w.tipton@gmail.com (Geo)
item.description: A deep dive into developing a deliberately vulnerable web application for a local security meetup CTF event, exploring the challenges, learning opportunities, and the balance between education and entertainment.
